name: Ascension (JustAlternate, zazak, Nyoukki, Imergal)
description:
This game was created by 5 students from Polytech Grenoble.

And was made in 1 week during the Black and White Jam #0.(9) game jam.

https://itch.io/jam/black-and-white-jam-9

The entire game is in black and white to fullfill the restriction of the jam and the theme is "Death is a new begining".

As a puzzle game, you will have to make your way through multiple rooms in a building to escape.
